long_description: Soothe your furry friend's cuts and scratches with the all-natural Healers VetEssentials Wound Care. All-natural blend of essential oils soothes irritated skin from cuts, scratches, rashes, burns, insect bites and other minor superficial wounds. Safe to use around your pet's eyes, nose and mouth. Healers VetEssentials Wound Care is environmentally friendly and contains no antibiotics, steroids or alcohols.
short_description: Soothe your furry friend's cuts and scratches with the all-natural Healers VetEssentials Wound Care.
